Package com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArtifactSettings
    Apache Cassandra artifact settings.
    ArtifactSettings.Builder
    Builds instances of type ArtifactSettings.
    BootstrapSettings
    Bootstrap settings to configure Apache Cassandra.
    BootstrapSettings.Builder
    Builds instances of type BootstrapSettings.
    ClientEncryptionOptions
    Client-to-node encryption protects data in flight from client machines to a database cluster using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    ClientEncryptionOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type ClientEncryptionOptions.
    Config
    Configuration properties for Apache Cassandra.
    Config.Builder
    Builds instances of type Config.
    ParameterizedClass
    Simple Holder for complex properties.
    ParameterizedClass.Builder
    Builds instances of type ParameterizedClass.
    RequestSchedulerOptions
    Contains a list of properties that define configuration options fo RequestScheduler.
    RequestSchedulerOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type RequestSchedulerOptions.
    ServerEncryptionOptions
    Node-to-node encryption protects data transferred between nodes in a cluster, including gossip communications, using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer).
    ServerEncryptionOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type ServerEncryptionOptions.
    TransparentDataEncryptionOptions
    Enables encryption of data at rest (on-disk).
    TransparentDataEncryptionOptions.Builder
    Builds instances of type TransparentDataEncryptionOptions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommitFailurePolicy
    Policy for commit disk failures.
    CommitLogSync
    Policy for commit log sync.
    DiskAccessMode
    Disk access mode policy.
    DiskFailurePolicy
    Policy for data disk failures.
    DiskOptimizationStrategy
    The strategy for optimizing disk read.
    InternodeCompression
    Compression controls whether traffic between nodes is compressed.
    InternodeEncryption
    Policy for internode encryption.
    MemtableAllocationType
    Specify the way Cassandra allocates and manages memtable memory.
    RequestSchedulerId
    Policy for request scheduler id.
    Version
    Enumeration of supported Apache Cassandra versions.
